description: The Canadian Coast Guard HQ requires repairs to the electrical pedestal #6
full_summary:
### Invitation to Qualify: Electrical Repairs at Southside Base, Newfoundland

**Reference Number:** cb-742-54942645
**Solicitation Number:** 30006410
**Publication Date:** November 19, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** December 5, 2024, 2:00 PM (EST)
**Project Description:**
A requirement has been identified for electrical repairs at the Canadian Coast Guard HQ building located at 280 Southside Road, St. John's, Newfoundland. The scope of work includes repairs to the electrical pedestal #6, which entails selective replacement of conduit under the wharf portion, electrical cables through existing conduit from the pedestal to the electrical building, and new receptacles on the pedestal.

**Estimated Duration:** It is anticipated that the successful contractor will complete the work in approximately 8 weeks.

**Drawings and Specifications:**
Drawings and specifications will be shared with qualified bidders during Phase 1 of the process, when the Invitation to Tender (ITT) document is distributed in Phase 2.

**Required Services:**
The requirement is for facility maintenance and repair services (UNSPSC: 72102900).

**Procurement Details:**
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** St. John's, NL
* **Regions of Delivery:** St. John's, NL, Newfoundland and Labrador

**For more information, please contact:**
Tammy O'Toole
Email: [tammy.otoole@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:tammy.otoole@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)
Phone: (343) 550-1758

**Documents:**
The tender notice, including the Invitation to Qualify, can be found at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/52068/30006410---rfq-en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/52068/30006410---rfq-en.pdf) (English) and [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/52068/30006410---ddq-fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/52068
